content: honeycomb lacy cocoon cardigan yarn - any dk-weight yarn in the color of your choice estimated yardage 900 1200 1500 yards hook and other materials 5 mm crochet hook construction notes 1 this cardigan is worked flat in row with the collar and sleeves made in rounds 2 the pattern works flat you can customize the size by increasing or reducing your starting chains finished measurement size s and color codes - xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl 5xl bust measurement xs s m = 38 l xl 2xl = 44 3xl 4xl 5xl = 50 length of cardigan xs s m = 28 l xl 2xl = 31 3xl 4xl 5xl = 33 the modeled garment is shown in xs s m
